page.title: 20ADULT LIFE STYLES
page.content: A typical day begins at 6.45am. The husband shaves and goes off to work on board ship in the R.N. Dockyard. He travels across by boat,which can be uncomfortable in the winter. When he has gone,his wife goes back to sleep! When she wakes up -or is woken by the children, she sends them off to school. She then has breakfast and gets out the vacuum cleaner before getting ready for work. After tidying up she says "Goodbye" to Sam,the dog and sets off for work at the Hyperstore,where she has a hectic days work. Home again at around 5pm,it's time for tea and afterwards maybe watching the television if there's any time to relax!
